inn1.comm: a bit of swing, from leg to off, gambhir flicks away deftly to get off the mark
angles across DK who stays in the crease and shoulders arms. Welegedera is operating from over the sticks here
straighter ball, DK tries to tap it to the leg side but can't get it away
cracker! Jags in from outside off and straightens, beats DK's tentative front-foot prod - not very far from the outer edge
another straight one outside off, lets it go outside off
back of a length from over the stumps, Gambhir stays back and defends to the off side
plays with very soft hands this time, and dinks it to the off side for a quick single to point
loses the radar, that one swings well wide down the leg side
very weird shot, picks four for it, he was trying to open the face and run it fine to the off side, but somehow got it to the left of Sangakkara. It runs away for four to fine leg
more conventional this time, gets behind the line and defends off the front foot
more text-book defence, back of a length from Maharoof, DK gets back and blocks
good variety, gets this one to jag into DK, who is falling across his stumps, but gets his bat down in time to squirt it to the leg side for one
angles across and sails safely across DK who lets it go without fuss
jags in from outside off, from back of a length. DK defends well off the back foot
brute of a delivery, and again DK survives Welegedare but only just. This one angled across the batsmen who played the forward defensive without much clue, and it zipped past his outside edge
nice bowling, gets this one to straighten back in, but DK is up to it this time, defended to the off side
another sharp in-ducker, Karthik gets ready to cut and changes his mind at the last moment to defend it to the off side. Good decision
stays on to the pads this time, but Karthik can't get the boundary. Tucks it neatly off the back foot to square leg for one
slow and short of a length outside off, Karthik can't get any timing into the back foot cover drive

perfects the shot this time. Given the width and the lack of pace, DK had the time to rock back and unfurl the back foot cover drive, it was timed well enough to just run away from the cover fielder who chased it all the way and dived
similar ball, slightly closer to the batsman, who tries to drive straighter and it goes straight to mid off.
straightens the line with the leg-cutter slower ball on middle and leg. Karthik spots it but does not risk a slog.
back to outside off, Karthik again mistimes the back foot punch and it rolls to the off side
defends to the leg side, off the back foot to end the over
Gambhir does the good old Mathew Hayden, walks down the pitch to negate Welegedara's spin and then defends to the off side
good response, Welegedara pre-empts the walk down and bangs it in shorter, Gambhir tries to cut from the crease but has no room and bottom-edges to the keeper
short of a length on off stump, Gambhir tries to square drive off the back foot, and finds point.
another bouncer, Welegedara has no pace, operating in the mid 120s, Gambhir tries to cut it as it passes him at shoulder high but can't connect
misses out on a gift. Full and sprayed on leg stump, Gambhir misses the flick, and it runs off his pads to the leg side for just one leg bye
Karthik trots out of his castle and works the short ball off his hips to square leg to pick a couple

alright, Gambhir's seen enough of Maharoof, comes down the track again, in the Sourav Ganguly fashion this time, opening up the off side and going for the carved drive over point. Just high enough to elude Jayawardene's jump
nice come back - he shifts to round the wicket and angles it into Gambhir, beating his defensive prod all ends up
just outside off, Gambhir opens the face and defends to point
down the track again and played to mid off for a quick single
short of a length, Karthik pre-meditates the move down the pitch, but the ball is not there for the drive
finishes off with another slower ball, driven along the ground wide of mid off for one
there's no pace on offer, so Karthik is doing all the running here. He's again out of the crease, and since its not pitched up, plays it softly to mid on for one
sucker ball, full and wide of off stump, trying to bring Mahela at short point into play, but Gambhir defends it to him
SMASH! Gambhir's been bothered by bouncers in the recent pace, but at Welegedara's pace, he has no problems. Pulled in the air, but well into the gap at square leg
on the pads again, and Gambhir can't capitalise. Misses out on the flick

good ball, great shot and wonderful fielding! It was the inswinger, tailing into Gambhir, who negated the movement by chipping out and flicked crisply. Suraj Randiv inside the circle at midwicket dives acrobatically to his right to save a few
another fullish ball outside off, Gambhir yorks himself by moving out and can't power the off drive. It dribbles straight to mid off
full ball tailing into Karthik, who plays the forward defensive back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and off, Karthik innovates again without earning value for his efforts and glances to square leg for one
short of length and angling across Gambhir who again jumps out, but can't manufacture driving length
this time he gets the width and cuts, but can't cash in as he's hit it straight to point. Fumble concedes a single
angled into Karthik's pads, he quietly works it to the leg side
another fumble, Gambhir works it off his pads straight to midwicket who lets it through
good lengths here, nothing to drive, Gambhir deflects it off the back foot to point
ooh, lovely inswinging yorker, caught Gambhir napping and he just about managed to squeeze his bat down on it and squit it behind square on the leg

tight single to mid off! Karthik chose the wrong man to take on, Dilshan swooped in on the ball, picked up and threw over-arm, not from very far, and Karthik dived in. The ball missed the stumps, would have been out if he'd hit.
tries to punch down the ground, but Mathews fields it. Not timed very well
another flick, finds the fielder at short midwicket between the gaps

cheeky and gets away with it! That was wide of off stump, but bounced big on Gambhir, who was unfazed and hung back in the crease to essay the upper cut, that flew just over the head of the lone slip, to third man
Karthik continues in his soporific ways, plays straight to mid on

finally we know Karthik's plan. He plays it softer this time to mid on and runs a quick single, the fielder shies at the stumps and hits. But it deflects away to the leg side and Karthik steals some overthrows. Sly
opens the face outside off and deflects to third man for a single
Karthik chips out and tries to work the ball from outside off to the leg side. No timing, straight to mid on
this one keeps low outside off, Karthik tries to cut but is beaten by the lack of bounce

No problemo this time as Karthik finishes the tenth over with his shot of the day so far. Short and wide enough outside off for the rasping cut, but he had to bisect point in the circle and a not so fine third-man. He did that with surgical precision.
ooh, good old-fashioned lemon-cut or as Geoffrey Boycott calls it, French cut or Chinese cut, but it eludes leg stump and Sangakkara tidies up.
angles in from well wide of the crease, Gambhir plays it away with the angle off his pads square on the leg side
gift.. Leg cutter goes awry and ends up on Karthik's hips on leg stump, he glances it along to fine leg
whoa! Karthik surprises every with a hat-trick of boundaries. Not much timing on this off drive, but straight enough to beat the dive of a very wide mid off.
this time, he drives crisply down the ground to the leg side for one more.
another one angled into Gambhir from wide of the crease, nudged to the leg side for one. It's Gambhir's turn to pull an over gaaji.
full on off, driven back to the bowler

Suraj Randiv take a bow! Catch of the tournament! He did this once before, diving to his right to save a boundary, but this time he's stopped Gambhir's innings. That was short and asking for punishment, Gambhir obliged by opening up his stance and whack-pulling it with ferocity well to the right of Randiv at short midwicket... but in the air. Randiv dived across full length and itercepted it mid-air, fully horizontal to pluck it one-handed. Classy.
Kohli gets going with a nice piece of timing, flicked pleasingly to midwicket
dangerous from Karthik, looking for a dangerous nudge without any room outside off, bottom-edged perilously close to the stumps
top shot. Sprayed down to leg, but Karthik had to play it fine enough to elude fine leg. He did just that, glancing it nicely
well outside off this time, and Karthik opens the face to pick a single down to third man
slow and wide outside off, angled easily down to third man again
effort ball, beats Kohli's cover drive all ends up with some sharp lift, just away from the outside edge
played more watchfully this time, gets well forward and check drives into the covers
nicely driven this time, again leaning into the cover drive into the outfield
again short outside off and again Karthik eases it off the face to third man. Already feels like he's done it a 1000 times today.
on Kohli's pads, leans into it and flicks to square leg
starts off with a good flighted left armer outside off, beats Kohli with the turn and flight, but the outside edge flies to the left of point for four
shortens the length, and it straigtens off leg stump. Defended down the track
this time, strays on to the pads and Kohli works it to the leg side
slightly fuller on off, Kohli gets forward and defends
pushed in faster, driven straight to mid on
finishes off with another straightener from leg stump, Kohli glances it softly for a single
straight ball in the corridor outside off, back of a length and defended off back foot into the covers
slightly wider of off stump and short, Kohli resists the temptation to cut or upper-cut and lets it go

he's a goner this time! Maharoof keeps it outside off, moved away ever so slightly from off stump and it was enough to fox Kohli, and get the edge as he prodded unconvincingly off the back foot. Sangakkara leaps in joy after pouching it, and that's another failure for Kohli in the Asia Cup.
Rohit shoulders arms outside off to his first ball
..and does the same to his second ball as well.
worked off the back foot from outside off, with soft hands to the leg side of the wicket for a quick single. Rohit is away
tossed up on middle and off, a bit of dip and drift, Rohit manages to drive a little airlily but safe to long off

whoa! Billy Bowden sets a record for a late decision, that would have made Steve Bucknor proud! Superb bowling from Herath, spin and bounce from middle, ripping across Karthik. Did it take the edge on the way to Sangakkara? Sri Lanka thought so, and around 10 seconds later, so did Billy who raised the crooked finger. Karthik goes in the 40s again.
flight outside off, defends to the off side
Raina comes out of the crease watchfully and plays down wide of mid on
nice turn again, squares up Rohit and dribbles off the outside edge of his forward prod
looped up on leg stump, swept fine of square leg for a couple
good looking shot, check-drive off the back foot with tining that comes naturally to this man, straight to point
defends off the front foot into the covers
full and wide outside off, Rohit eases into the cover drive but can't elude cover
another flowing cover drive, but the placement is not there
gets it away to the leg side this time, worked away from wide outside off once again
short and on off stump, Raina jumps up and rides the bounce, before nudging to fine leg for one
short and wide outside off, Raina plays it watchfully mindful of the fielders breathing down his neck
on the pads this time, Raina leans forward and defends to the leg side
back of a length outside off, Raina runs it off the back foot to point
fuller outside off, Raina comes forward and check-drives to covers
similar ball, played with softer balls and he thinks of a quick single. Rohit sends him back
good start from Randiv, keeping things tight. Raina again leans forward and defends to the off side
comes down the track and flicks off leg stump for a single wide of mid on
Raina jumps out of the crease and goes across to off stump as the ball is tossed up wide of him. Defence
stays in the crease and works it towards point
turn, straightening from leg to middle, Rohit defends watchfully
he chips down the pitch again, negating the spin and working it off his legs to midwicket
on Raina's pads, he turns it away carefully to short midwicket for no run
flighted outside off, Sharma plays after the turn down the track
turns to the leg side this time and Rohit plays off the back foot to midwicker
chips down the track and works it wide of the bowler to long on for one
plays it off leg stump to square leg for one

whoa! What was Rohit trying to do there. He is down the track again.. does not make it to the pitch of the ball, and then manufactures an inside-out cover drive, against the spin, with bat turning in his hands, in the air and tantalisingly close to the fielder prowling at cover. It lands safely and runs away for four
straightens from outside off, Raina pushes forward and plays to the covers
over-pitched on leg stump, and Rohit fails to exact full toll - flicked straight to deep midwicket
clever little sweep from Raina, ensuring he got it very fine off his pads and runs across for two before long leg tidies up
opens the face outside off and works it to the right of point for a single
fumble from Welegedara gives Rohit four. He jumped out with intent this time, took it on the full and flicked firmly wide of mid on, and Welegedara let it go as he tumbled to his right
finishes off with a defensive shot to the off side
misses the cut as it turns from outside off away from him
timing, class, elegance and promise written all over that as Raina chips out, gets under the ball and lofts it easily high over long on
shortens the length and moves outside off again. Raina defends to the off side
strays on the pads, no fuss from Raina who guides it behind square leg for one
tossed up on middle and leg, Rohit gets forward and plays defensively to the leg side
he chips out this time, and gets some pad on it as it pops up on the leg side
Raina moves across to the off stump and works it away off the back foot to midwicket
Sharma saunters down the track and flicks from leg stump for a single

whoa! A tight call there but the right one and Raina has to go! That was speared in from wide of the crease, from round the wicket, Raina goes for the sweep and misses as it straightens. Hits him in front of middle and off. Umpire Oxenford rules it out after thinking hard and long. Big wicket - pitched on leg and would have hit the top of middle.
another straighter one, Dhoni plays watchfully
defends into the off side to end the over
sharp turn into Rohit and hits his pads but missing leg easily
top-edges the sweep, perilously close to the hands of a jumping leg slip but there is no fine leg and it is four
waits for the spin and defends to the leg side of the pitch
moves down the crease again and works it to the leg side
Dhoni comes down the track as he always does, at the speed of light and.... defends
stays in the crease and works it with the spin to mid on.
opens the face and steals a single into the off side
Dhoni prances out of the crease and works it to the right of the bowler. Makes the single easily, he had completed half before even meeting the ball
plays defensively to the off side field
tossed up on middle, Rohit gets forward and plays back to the bowler
that kept slightly low as Rohit looked to cut, still got it away for a single
Dhoni hangs back in the crease and deflects it off the face to point
goes for the paddle sweep but not hit firmly enough. Still gets the single
Dhoni finds the gap in customary fashion., Rocks back and cuts against the turn, between the fielders in the off side and through to the cover fence
close to the stumps this time, he can't time the cut
sharp spin into Dhoni, who is trying to unsettle the bowler with his unpredictable trigger movements, front and back
wider outside off and Dhoni can't get it away in the off side
fuller outside off, Dhoni leans into it and re-directs it with the turn to mid on for one
ah, Dhoni walks down the crease and outside edges the short of length ball as he looks to steer. The edge flies well wide of Sangakkara and for four to third man
Dhoni again walks towards off stump, and the ball is again well wide of off stump. He lets it go this time
nice surprise ball, bouncer outside off. Dhoni was walking down again, but checked himself early and weaved away as it darted up from short of a length
Dhoni plays another walking off drive to the short of length delivery, but finds mid off

short and wide outside off, and Dhoni plays the whip-lash helicopter cut of his, with the bat completing a full 360 degrees of follow through after making contact., The ball races to the point fence in a trice
and finishes off with a dot ball. Good over for India
Rohit comes down the pitch and chips it airlily, but ensured he got it very straight, for a couple before long on got to it
angles into him with the spin, Rohit waits and nudges behind square leg for one
similar ball, and Dhoni deals with it in his own fashion, staying back and flicking to square leg for a quick single
slower and tossed up on middle, draws Rohit forward and he plays it back to the bowler
shortens the length and Rohit can't get to the pitch. Plays it defensively to the leg side
short and wide outside off and Dhoni drives off the back foot straight to cover
back of a length on middle and off, Dhoni looks to work it to the leg side, can't get it away and tries to pinch a single before changing his mind
this time, he stays back and gets it away between square leg and midwicket for onr
slowish and short of a length outside off... Rohit opens the face to get it away behind square on the off side for one
length ball, and Dhoni is caught on the back foot as he tries to manufacture a back foot punch. Not much timing, into the covers

slightly shorter this time and its enough for Dhoni to get muscle behind that backfoot punch. But not enough to beat the sweeper in the outfield. Gets a single to retain strike.. Dhoni is from Chennai Super Kings too.. so no surprise about another instance of over gaaji
spins across Dhoni from off, he presses forward, pushes back and then gets something on it down to short fine leg for one
sharp spin into Rohit as he shaped to cut, it got too close to him and bounced big.. he still got it away to point for a quick single
Dhoni stays back and works it with the spin to square leg
pitched further up outside off, but Rohit punches off the back foot through the covers
Dhoni absolutely pounces on that one and then deflects it with soft hands to midwicket.. This man has an inexplicable style of batting..  Mighty effective
plays it back to the left of the bowler who tidies up.. Dot ball

there.. again.. Show me another batsman who plays that shot on purpose. Short and wide outside off, asking to be cut.. But Dhoni wanted to get four for it and not one to the sweeper, so he played a pull/club/cut that went through extra cover instead, eluding the swepeer for four
defends this time after motioning down the pitch
works it away off the back foot as it angles into him for one
a gentle off cutter, gets the inside edge of Rohit's bat as he looks to drive off the front foot.. Goes straight down the pitch to the leg side and they decide to stay in the crease
opens up the off side and looks for an expansive cover drive, but it goes straight to the fielder
this one darts in on to his pads and Rohit works it through square leg to bring up 150 and retain strike
spins in from outside leg and Rohit gets it away for a single to leg side
very short, Dhoni's eyes brifly flash dollar signs as he looks to whack the covers off it, but does not middle the pull shot
spins from middle to off, Rohit comes forward and defends to the off side
sharpish spin from leg stump, hint of leading edge to the covers as Rohit tries to smother it
more in control this time - works it away to mid on for one
Dhoni hangs back, waits for the spin and tries to whip it with bottom hand through the covers, but finds the fielder
straight ball, back of a length on middle stump from left arm over. Rohit stays back and nudges off the pads for one
over-pitched outside off, without much pace.. Dhoni looks for the drive, but the lack of the pace ends up taking it to mid on
clever slower ball on middle and leg, Dhoni spots it eventually, and plays watchfully
stays back and works it off his pads for a single to square leg
lack of pace ruins Rohit's attempted hoick down the ground.. he ends up dragging it from outside off, without timing to deep midwicket for a couple
good surprise bouncer, but Rohit is up to it, riding the bounce and rolling his wrists over it to send it along the carpet to deep square leg
flight outside off, defended off front foot to off side
shortens the length a bit, Rohit comes out of the crease and plays back to the bowler
straighter, angles into leg stump, so Rohit flicks it away between mid on and midwicket
hurries through outside off, beating Dhoni's cut
flighted on middle and off, gets forward and defends back to the bowler
more flight on off, Dhoni is not getting sucked into indiscretion ahead of the drinks break and defends to the covers... Drinks.
full toss on the pads and worked away to midwicket. Fifty run stand
a hint of inswing into Dhoni, who spots it early and drills it down the ground for a couple off the back foot
slightly slower ball, befuddles Rohit's flick to midwicket and goes straight to the fielder
round the sticks, angled into Dhoni.. patted back to the bowler
strays on to the pads and Dhoni jumps back and pulls off his hips very fine for four
Superb timing! Full toss on the pads, and Dhoni adjusted his drive at the last minute to guide it to the right of mid on all the way for four.
Rohit's shot of the day! he opened up the off side, got under the ball and drove in the air over the covers, with the spin.. Timing, placement and most importantly - presence of mind
short of a length, Rohit stays back and pull-flicks it down past mid on
short but not very wide outside off.. but enough fotr Dhoni to whip out the cut.. Misfield at point concedes a couple
slow long hop and Dhoni is beside himself with eagerness to smash it.. Does not time it too well - straight to deep midwicket
tossed up, full toss on the pads and Rohit flicks non-chalantly wide of mid on
another hop down the pitch, Dhoni can't get it away though and works it back to the bowler
tails in marginally from outside off, Dhoni tries to work it away to the on side and misses.. Struck outside the line of off
this time he gets it down between the bowler and mid on for one
hint of outside edge as he opens the face and looks to run it down to third man.. goes very fine for a couple
straight ball, angles in and Rohit works it away without fuss to bring up a fifty that he went about almost completely unnoticed. Well played
darts on to Dhoni's pads, he stays back and looks to run it to the leg side for one
short and outside off, Dhoni can't get it past short extra cover
short again and angling into him, Dhoni cross-bats it to long on for one
slow, short and complete lack of bounce.. Rohit digs low to get bat on it
short again and wide outside off, Rohit places the cut expertly between point in the circle and the sweeper. Jayawardene tidies up in the outfield to save a run
Dhoni leaps out and drills it back towards the bowler. Herath fields it and is still in one piece

wicket against the run of play, and a huge one! Dhoni is run out. Tapped with soft hands straight to point, and Rohit calls Dhoni across for a tight single.. he hares down to the non-striker's end but is beaten easily by Kapugedera, swooping in from point and letting rip an arrow-throw to the non-striker's end.

and he's gone first ball, playing all around a straight ball like a deer caught in the headlights! Jadeja walked across to the off stump for some reason and missed a ball headed for middle stump. India have lost two in two.

Team hat-trick! Maharoof has gone past Praveen Kumar first ball, as he looked to play a nothing-shot to a ball not too short and far too close to off stump. The inside edge falls on the stumps and Maharoof is now on a hat-trick all of his own!

AND HE'S DONE IT! Rangiri Dambulla comes alive, as Zaheer Khan outside edges a ball that was doing nothing special, except that it was pitched on off.. Zaheer got forward and poked without much conviction and the outside edge flew wide of Sangakkara, who dives to his right and plucked it.. Four in four for SL.. Maharoof who made an unexpected comeback for the Asia Cup is the man of the moment.
Dinda defends outside off to deprive Maharoof the chance to do a Malinga..
effort ball, Maharoof bangs it in short and Dinda just about keeps it away to the leg side
Dinda drives into the off side and thinks of a single.. Rohit will have none of it.. that sensational over comes to an end.
first ball from Randiv slides down the leg for a wide
moves across to the leg side, but it turns in to him and cramps him for room.. He cross bats it down to long on and turns the strike to Dinda
another wide, sliding marginally down the leg
Dinda defends the flighted ball down the pitch
again, defensively played down the track.. Not too clear why Rohit gave him strike
ugly swipe across the line, and lucky that he did not hit it in the air.. Straight to midwicket
stays in the crease and plays around another offie spinning into him
ends the over with a defensive prod.. A nightwatchman in an ODI in the Powerplays.. Score!
Mathews keeps it full follows Rohit as he moves to the leg side, and he;s forced to play softly back to the bowler
short ball, angling in and Rohit pulls but can't evade square leg.. Strike has been relinquished
cross-batted good old tailender's pull over the bowler's head down the ground for a couple
Smashed down the ground, right off the screws.... Sadly, Dinda missed the line of the ball by a few inches.. A strong wind blowing across the ground, thanks to Dinda's almighty swing of the bat
tries to work it from outside off and misses the glide. Dot

and Maharoof has another one! Superb yorker, tailing in on leg stump and Dinda plays a questionable swipe off the back foot instead of guarding his castle.. He misses, Maharoof hits and India are nine down! Maharoof has a five-for!
nicely done.. Rohit opens up the off side, gets under it and goes over covers inside out
on to the pads this time and Rohit turns it away to midwicket
flighted outside off, Ojha gets forward and defends
and again.. showing more sense than Dinda suggested he has
and he keeps out the last ball as well. India live to face another over
the kind of shot that will make Sehwag proud! Full and wide outside off, Rohit did away with the nitty gritty of footwork, and whacked it with good timing over the infield in the off side
length ball on Rohit's pads and he flicks it over midwicket this time for four more

all over. Rohit is run out trying to keep strike. Full and wide outside off, but this time he does not middle the lofted square drive.. It dribbles down to third man, and Rohit runs back desperate to keep strike. Razor-sharp throw from Mahela, I reckon - Sanga had little to do, as Rohit jumped inside in an attempt to make his crease.. but the bails were already off. India have collapsed in bizarre fashion here.

inn2.comm: exaggerated swing away from the left hander who shoulders arms and lets it go
another lovely little away-swinger, pitches on middle and darts away
three in three and he's getting the ball into the business areas. Pitches on leg and middle this time.
this one moves away as well, but stays very low. Tharanga has nothing to do with it.. Two slips waiting for him to poke
and the variation. Bowls the leg cutter, jags back in from outside off and Tharanga is forced to fend to the leg side
finishes off with another that moves away. Maiden for PK, India make a solid start, but they need wickets
inward movement from back of the length for Zaheer, Dilshan plays down the track watchfully
ridiculously wide that even Dilshan did not fancy swinging at it as it sailed in the general direction of first slip. Dhoni moves across to collect
back on target, straightens from middle and off, similar to the ball that got Shoaib Malik in the previous game. Dilshan though is equal to it
this one goes straight across and Dilshan tries to force off the back foot. He finds point
width and length, that's two gifts too many for Dilshan who frees his arms and smokes it through the covers. First four for Sri Lanka

four more, without much control this time.. That darted in and Dilshan went for the swipe over the leg side.. Got a thickish outside edge that flew over point, and Gambhir and third man made a mess after running across and tumbling
this time he perfects the swipe-pull over square leg, helping it with the inward movement and sends it sailing high over the ropes. Seeya later Zaheer!
and Tharanga will not be left behind! Pitched in his area, he moves forward and drives through the line wide of mid off for four. Shot!
slightly wider away, and he tries to cut away from the body. Bottim edge dribbles down to Dhoni
this one darts back in from off stump, Tharanga opens the face and plays it to point
a hint of inside edge as he looks to play down thr ground, takes it to short mid wicket
good bouncer, had Tharanga in knots as he was hurried into the pull. It flew off the top edge behind square leg, but fell safe

lucky! Not too short and just outside off, Dilshan decides to pull but its quicker onto him that he expected and the bottom edge raced past off stump. Dhoni cannot dive across quick enough to save it either and its four to fine leg
Zaheer hits the deck and pegs Tharanga back as he rises on his toes and defends
drifts onto the pads and Tharanga neatly flicks it behind square leg for a couple
hint of away movement, but too short to trouble the players and not enough pace. It is cut away without much timing, and fielded well by a tumbling Kohli at point
once again on the pads, Tharanga tucks it away without fuss.
asking for trouble.. Short and into Dilshan's body, he misses the pull-swing and is very dismayed with himself. Eventually runs across for the leg bye
decent pace by Zaheer's standards outside off, but the ball just dies down after pitching. Good thing that the finals won't be played on this track
moves in off the seam as Dilshan looks to move to the leg side and free his arms. Ends up having to play it straight back to mid on
again, Praveen is focusing on cramping Dilshan for room and cutting his shots through the off side. Played back from leg stump off the back foot to the bowler
drops short outside off this time and Dilshan can't time the pull too well due to the lack of pace. Gets a couple behind square leg
short and wide, cut away fiercely into the ground. Kohli at point leaps high to stop it on the bounce
tails in sharply on to the pads and Dilshan gets some pad on it to square leg
slow and wide and ball literally rolls after bouncing.. Dhoni misses it again and they get a couple of byes
effort ball on off stump, hurries on to Dilshan who tries an ill-advised back foot cover drive and does not make much contact
slides down the leg and concedes a wide
China cut for four, hurries on to Dilshan as he looks to to cut and it darts off the inside edge agonisingly close to the stumps

India strike with some smart field placement! Short ball, challenges Dilshan to spull and he obliges, but can't keep it along the ground and it carries straight to deep midwicket. Against the run of play, India have struck.
in-ducker to Tharanga who had crossed over, pokes at it unconvincingly and gets an inside edge squirted to square leg
ramrod straight on middle, defended with the full face of the bat to mid on
swings in marginally from off stump, Tharanga hangs in the crease and defends to mid off
Praveen angles it across Sanga, not su much seam movement for him anymore but he's keeping it tight
again angling across without much pace, and short of a length. Sanga gets behind and defends down the track
straightens this one off the seam, Sanga stays back and tucks it behind square leg
angles this into Tharanga from round the wickets, punched into the ground and short cover does well to jump and stop
fuller on off and middle, driven back firmly to Praveen who bends quickly and stops it
back over the wicket, but sprayed on leg stump, Tharanga gets it away fine for a leg bye
straight and tight on middle stump, defended down the ground off back foot
ooh, good channel from Zaheer, just outside off, Tharanga drives without getting to the pitch and gets an inside edge that hits his pads. Could have landed on the furniture easily
hint of away movement from middle, Tharanga check-drives to mid off. Good bowling from Zaheer following that horror opening over
short and wide enough for Tharanga to upper-cut deliberately well over the head of what would have been second slip, and through for four to third man
he inches down the track this time and takes it off the pads, working it down to square leg
away swing again, Sanga gingerly leans into it and check-drives to short cover

he's climed onto that one! Length ball, juicy and slow outside off stump, Tharanga leans into it Ganguly style and lofts it high over wide long on. Hit is higher than he wanted and hence could not clear the ropes.. Couple of bounces for four
PK comes round the sticks and fires it on the pads, Tharanga happily tucks it behind square leg for two
leans into another well-timed cover-drive, bisecting wide mid on and extra cover. Saurabh Tiwary tidies up after giving chase
another forcing shot, hit into the ground and to Karthik at short cover on the bounce

up and away.. Tharanga is toying with Praveen's field placing, making full use of the lack of pace, and now, lack of movement as well. Short and wide outside off, Tharanga deliberately went aerial with the cut, over point and into the fence
straighter this time, forcing him to drive down the track to mid off
hint of away movement from outside off, uncertain prod from Sanga, gets the inside edge to square leg
ooh, Tharanga is early on the drive and it goes airily, but safe behind point
Sanga shows how it is done! What hands, what languid grace! Got forward and opened the wrists nicely to send it scurrying through the covers. Shot!
straighter this time from Zaheer and Sanga plays it watchfully to the on side
back of a length on leg stump, driven straight to mid off
short of a length again, forcing the batsman back and he defends back down the pitch
skids in from outside off, as Sanga shapes for the expansive cover drive
played away off middle and leg to short midwicket
tight line outside off, Sanga punches without timing straight to mid on
Ah! Driven wide of Praveen at mid on, who fumbles and misses a potential chance to run out as both batsmen are stuck mid-pitch with a botched up exercise in calling.
punched down to mid off for no run
finishes with a reasonably good bouncer. Batsman ducks under it comfortably
slow and outside off, easily square driven off the back foot for one
length ball outside off, driven well but straight to cover
slips this one very wide of off stump, he had to reach out for the cut and found the point fielder
whoa, big seam movement this time, it angled in, started from off stump and kept moving away, missing the attempted drive
leans into that one and rips off a smashing cover drive. Another top shot!
a fine comeback from Zaheer, who is only winning moral battles as of now. Beats the batsman with sharp movement outsoide off
Dinda is generous with width outside off, Tharanga flays the covers off it in a manner that would have done his predecessor Jayasuirya proud. Couple of bounces over the ropes
not too clear why Dinda is bowling short and wide outside off, but Tharanga is not complaining. Again cuts it high over the infield and it lands near the ropes and dribbles past the point boundary
for a change, he denies the batsman room, Tharanga is forced to check his cut and gets it away to the off side for a single
on Sanga's pads, he flicks off the back foot straight to short midwicket
short ball, pitching outside leg, Sanga misses the pull and it hits his pads. And Dinda then appeals.. Sanga now knows how it feels when the opposition appeals for no reason.
timed well from outside off, straight down the ground. Mid off had to put in some quick yards to cut that off
Zaheer bowls a bouncer at 136 kph, not enough to trouble the batsman who safely ducks.
draws Tharanga into the drive and he gets some inside edge through to midwicket
back of a length outside off, Tharanga defends off the back foot back to the bowler
strays on to the pads, but Tharanga can't put it away - played straight to mid on

Zaheer roars having finally got rid of Tharanga after having troubled him for a while. Short of a length outside off, nothing special about that ball, but that's like saying there was nothing special about Glenn McGrath. Tharanga again pokes uncertainly, and inevitably he's edged one. Dhoni does the rest.
full on Mahela's off stump and he defends quietly down the track to give Zaheer a wicket maiden
length ball on Sanga's pads from over the stumps. Absolutely no movement from Dinda. Punched to midwicket
punched down the track again, past the diving bowler and the tumbling mid on. How many fielders does it take to stop a ball?
back of a length outside off, and punched to the off side
thickish outside edge from well outside off, flies down to third man

Dropped by Dhoni! Harsh call, bt that will go down as a chance.. Sliding down the leg and Mahela gets bat on that glance which went alarmingly fine. Dhoni dived to his left, a little too late to pouch it
Sanga flicks with typically perfect timing and placement. He has found the gap between midwicket, square leg and co. for three
Tossed up on off stump and driven back to the bowler
shortens the length and Sanga stays back and drives to mid on
slightly outside off, Sanga tries to angle it behind point but finds the fielder
Sanga gets another dose of his own medicine. A nothing appeal as the ball turned from outside off and hit his pads well down the track. Hang on, that was not an entirely absurd appeal.
stays back and punches through the covers for a single
works this one behind point and gets the single
gentle loosener to begin after the break, and Sanga is happy to lean into another beautiful cover drive. Nothing ball, got what it deserved
Dinda digs a bouncer in real short, Sanga ducks under it
back of a length on off stump, Sanga stays back and drives to mid off
pitched further up, driven nicely but can't beat the fielder at mid off

If you got timing, you got what it takes! Sanga hangs in the crease and middles a drive through midwicket and wide mid on, the ball kept accdelerating along the turf. Dinesh Karthik eventually realised he was running a race long lost
lucky this time.. Dinda gets him to edge outside the off but there is no slip and it runs away for four more to third man
flighted on leg and tunring across Mahela. Played away watchfully
this time he gets it away off leg stump to midwicket for a single
tossed up on off stump, Sanga gets forward and blocks
he almost gets him, but Dhoni fails to collect! Sanga jumps out of the crease and gets a very fine edge behind that Dhoni does not collect. Another chance goes abegging
worked away from the pads behind square leg for one
turns away from Mahela as he looks to cut. Can't get it away
this time he gets it away for a single to the off side
Sanga works it away off the pads with the spin for a single to the on side
short enough for Mahela to wait and cut it away for a single
sharp spin there, but slow enough for Mahela to wait on it and angle it away to the off side
too ambitious, lands it on leg stump, looking for a ripping spinner.. Nothing of that sort trasnpires, Mahela calmy gets across and sweeps it for four
tossed up on leg stump and Mahela drives it to the off side for one
tossed up on Sanga's off stump and he drives firmly wide of long on
armer hurries on from middle to leg, Mahela defends to the leg side
gets him away for a single to retain strike
defended with the spin to the off side.
Sharp turn again for Jadeja, gets the outside edge but it is safe
Sanga is content to tuck it with the spin to the leg side for one
back of a length, straightens from leg stump and Mahela works it to midwicket for a quick single
tapped of the backfoot straight to midwicket
flighted on off and middle, played watchfully by Mahela
and again, drives straight to mid off
gets it away this time between the bowler and mid off
straightens from outside off, Sanga hangs back and defends
on the pads and Sanga easily nudges to midwicket for a single. Lanka are doing this easily
tossed up on middle, Mahela presser forward and deflects to the leg side for one
cuts away from off stump into the covers for one
Almost! Sanga is troubled by the turn and bounce from over the wickets, and his fend goies between Dhoni and Rohit at leg slip. The fielder reacts late and it goes for four
Mahela rocks back and pulls a long hop without fuss between long on and midwicket.
again short on off stump, cut away easily for a single.
thrown up on middle and leg, played watchfully to mid on
shorter and outside off, cut away for a single to the sweeper
flighted on off, turns into Sanga, who gets forward. Loud appeal, but not given
down the track and clipped to wide mid on for one
turned off the pads to the leg side, half stop at short midwicket does not save the single
Sanga stays back and turns it away square on the leg side
down the track and chipped away to midwicket for another single. Sanga gets to fifty
again Mahela is troubled by the turn, outside edge dribbles away safely to the off side
ooh, quicker one had him in some strife as he sought to late cut, but Mahela's good enough to still keep it out
on the legs this time and it hits the pads, appeal without much conviction and rightfully turned down
cut away languidly from outside off for another single behind square.
the Majestic Mahela dances down the track and intentionally hoists Ojha over the head of a jumping mid-on fielder who really had no chance. Four more.
a bit of turn and bounce, but Mahela cuts it all the same for a single

Sri Lanka's best batsmen are toying with India's field placements here! This time it is Sanga's turn, intentionally sweeping over the head of Rohit Sharma at leg slip, who jumps without any chance of getting to it. Four to fine leg
and some more! Despatched with all the disdain in Dambulla! Sanga leaps out of the crease, gets to the pitch and smacks it high over midwicket. Easily into the gap between long on and midwicket
plays it with the turn to the off side, again a hint of outside edge
punched of the back foot to the off side, the bowler tidies
this time well-fielder by cover, who puts in a dive
worked with the spin straight to midwicket
this time he cuts straight to point. Suddenly finding all the fielders between the gaps is Sanga
finally gets it away, square driving to the deep for a single
slow and simple outside off, Sanga stays back and drives into the covers
on the pads, worked away off the back foot to midwicket
misses the late cut outside off
this time he chooses not to play the late cut
stays back and cuts easily behind square for a couple

yeah, that's how you deal with part-timers! Mahela sashays down the track and lofts him with the spin high over midwicket. Sri Lanka are finishing this in quick time, and India don't have the intent to stop them

and what does he do with the opportunity? He slips one short and slow on Sanga's pads, who glances it easily for four. India's fast bowling cupboard could not be more barren if it were a sub-Saharan settlement.
short and wide outside off, this time he cuts away to the fielder
bangs it in in his own half to get it to bounce. Called one for the over
over-pitched this time.. Driven straight past mid off for a couple
nudged off the pads behind square leg for one
no pace, no movement, and no creativity with line and length.. Mahela walks across and swats him away like a mosquito, in the air, couple of bounces into the midwicket fence
Sanga tries to work one off the pads and flicks straight to short midwicket
worked away off the back foot to midwicket again

chips down the track this time and flicks again.. Kohli fumbles at midwicket and it is a couple to the deep. 100 runs added by these two, just like that. They probably sweat more when they bat in the nets
worked away off the hips for another single
short and well wide outside off, Mahela tries to prod and misses
short again and pushes Mahela back. Textbook defence as he tightens his technique ahead of the final
worked away with the spin to the leg side for another single
Mahela stays back and defends to the off side. For some reason Sanga scurries halfway doen the track before going back
forward defensive masterclass
uses the wrists and works it to the leg side, Kohli fires in a throw from midwicket, but the single is long taken
another single for Sanga, angles it to the leg side with the spin
and another forward defensive to finish the over
another driving practice ball outside off, Sanga drives straight to the cover fielder
slightly shorter length, driven on the up but still can't beat the cover cordon
tries to work the short ball away off the hips, but can't time it
slow, looping, limp, lame and languid bouncer. Sanga ducks underneath it.
whoa, and again. Sanga does not want to give his wicket away here, so lets it go

well, he's had enough of hanging around so just out of frustration sashays down the track and goes through with the drive despite not getting to the pitch. It loops to mid on where Zaheer tumbles to the right to take the catch. Sanga's gone after playing a fine innings ahead of the finals
drives with the turn to the off side
works it away with the spin to the on side but can't get the single
Kandamby advances down the pitch but can't get to the pitch of the ball. Defended with bat and pad close toghether
and again,. Down the pitch defence
hangs back and glances this behind square to get off the mark
driven with minimal fuss from middle stump to long off
cut from well outside off behind point to turn the strike
short and wide outside off, and the lack of intensity from the Indians seems to be getting to the batsmen. Mahela attempts a loose waft and misses
rolls his fingers across for a leg cutter slower ball, but Mahela spots it and nudges it square to the leg side for a couple
another buffet ball and Mahela must be angry he could not add to his tally. Sliding down the leg, he just got something on it and sent it scurrying fine
again misses it as he tries to play a shot outside off
slow, short and wide, Mahela lets it go
turned away with the spin to the leg side.
Mahela gets forward and plays it from leg stump towards mid on
Perfect forward defensive from off stump line
slightly shorter length, Mahela gets some inside edge on the front-foot defense to square leg
played with the spin off the back foot to square leg
straightens from leg stump, Mahela again gets forward and blocks.
Kandamby leans forward and defends down the track
again, played into the covers. SL don't seem to want the pointless Bonus point. Can India still give them one?
Single! Whoop! To the covers off the outside edge
arm ball coming in, Mahela gets forward and defends
tossed up outside off and driven easily to sweeper cover
worked off the pads to midwicket who tumbles and fumbles. Kandamby runs across for two
ah, rapped on the pads by an armer angling in. There is an appeal, but its turned down and runs away for four
rank long hop, pulled without timing to the deep. Two more.
tossed up on leg stump, played down to the off side
defends to the off side. Soporific stuff.
now to the on side. Yawn.
deliberately padded to the off side. I haven't seen that in an ODI for a while. Mahela's fifty is on the platter now, ready to be devoured.
late cut goes straight to the fielder behind square on the off side

much ado about nothing. Mahela cuts uppishly, the fielder at point could not get there in time as it landed safely, but the throw came in to the non-striker's end as Kandamby ran back. It hit the stumps, but he was just in.
Mahela has had enough of this nonsense and slog-sweeps from outside off to midwicket. Fifty to Mahela and victory to Sri Lanka.
